column2: Lately every day seams so bleak. I need excitement in my life - someting with risk, something that can keep me busy, something that will make me think.
I will find excitement one way or another.

After deeply thinking about vocation that would suit  a man of my character I could only think of two possibilities. The first possibility is the most dangerous of scholary pursuits - the alchemy. The second is gambling - less prestigious but exciting all the same.
A bit of gambling sound good to me.
